lead_paragraph: SHAPIRO--Blanche. The family and friends of Blanche Shapiro deeply mourn her passing at the age of 106. Devoted wife of 82 years to Romie, Blanche was the epitome of a gracious hostess, the anchor for her husband and family. Her generosity extended not only to family and friends, but to numerous philanthropic organizations, art museums and especially the Bezalel Academy in Israel. Her gentle presence opened the hearts of everyone she knew. She was an inspiration and role model to us all. Contributions can be made to Friends of Bezalel, 370 Lexington Ave. - 1612, New York, NY 10017. 1/3
